      class  OffsetFeatureInitializer
      Wraps a given initializer.

      Creates an initializer from a univariate function f(x).

      Adds some amount of random data to the given initializer.

      Uniform sampling of the given range.

      Methods in org.apache.commons.math4.ml.neuralnet with parameters of type FeatureInitializer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds some amount of random data to the given initializer.
      Constructors in org.apache.commons.math4.ml.neuralnet with parameters of type FeatureInitializer 
      Constructor and Description
      OffsetFeatureInitializer(FeatureInitializer orig)
      Creates a new initializer whose OffsetFeatureInitializer.value() method will return orig.value() + offset, where offset is automatically incremented by one at each call.

    • Uses of FeatureInitializer in org.apache.commons.math4.ml.neuralnet.oned

      Constructors in org.apache.commons.math4.ml.neuralnet.oned with parameters of type FeatureInitializer 
      Constructor and Description
      NeuronString(int num, boolean wrap, FeatureInitializer[] featureInit)
      Creates a one-dimensional network: Each neuron not located on the border of the mesh has two neurons linked to it.

    • Uses of FeatureInitializer in org.apache.commons.math4.ml.neuralnet.twod

      Constructors in org.apache.commons.math4.ml.neuralnet.twod with parameters of type FeatureInitializer 
      Constructor and Description
      NeuronSquareMesh2D(int numRows, boolean wrapRowDim, int numCols, boolean wrapColDim, SquareNeighbourhood neighbourhoodType, FeatureInitializer[] featureInit)
      Creates a two-dimensional network composed of square cells: Each neuron not located on the border of the mesh has four neurons linked to it.
